subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Sometimes you do need shields!
author: Marlboro63@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1203871294
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hi Frank,
 
If I remember correctly...... I use to take apart the little transistor  
radio's from the late 60's and early 70's and they had a copper shielding built  
into them.  It was covering the internal antenna system what little of it  
there was and art of the main board.
 
Jeff



**************Ideas to please picky eaters. Watch video on AOL Living.      
(http://living.aol.com/video/how-to-please-your-picky-eater/rachel-campos-duffy/
2050827?NCID=aolcmp00300000002598)
